Who You Will Work With: Join the Product Design team at Interac, responsible for designing and providing UX support for all digital products. We are a collaborative team where everyone stays connected to each other's work. As a Product Design Intern, you will work closely with our design and research leads to help develop, evaluate, and refine the next generation of Interac products. Alongside design responsibilities, you will also support our UX Research team across key research activities. In this role, you can expect to: • Support Product Designers with everyday design tasks such as creating prototypes, refining design iterations, and participating in design critique sessions. • Aid in the creation of prototypes for presentation, user testing, and other product development needs. • Take ownership of your work and present to stakeholders. • Support design and research projects across Interac's product lines (e-Transfer, Debit, KONEK, Verified). • Assist in reviewing designs for accessibility standards. • Support the UX Research team through survey creation, A/B testing, insights gathering and synthesis, documentation, reporting, artefact creation, and other UXR-related tasks. • Participate in and support usability testing, user interviews, heuristic evaluations, and secondary research activities as required. • Communicate research insights and design decisions to stakeholders and collaborate closely with design and research leads. What You Will Do: • Design Execution: Translate business and stakeholder needs into design solutions using Figma, contributing to prototypes, visual design, and iterative improvements. • Design Thinking: Understand and empathize with user and stakeholder needs; ideate, prototype, and iterate based on feedback and observed user behavior. • UI Design: Apply strong Figma skills to create polished, user?friendly interfaces aligned with product goals and accessibility standards. • Communication: Share daily updates with your manager, collaborate with cross?functional partners, and confidently present design concepts and rationale. • Design Systems: Leverage and contribute to design system components, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and brand alignment. • Research Support: Assist in planning and executing research activities, including usability testing, surveys, heuristic evaluations, and user interviews. • Data Synthesis: Help analyze research findings, identify patterns, and translate insights into actionable recommendations for the design team. • Research Artefacts: Contribute to creating research documentation such as insights reports, journey maps, transcripts, and highlight decks. • Cross?Team Collaboration: Work closely with UX Researchers and Designers to ensure research learnings are incorporated into design decisions and product improvements. Job Requirements What You Bring: • Eligibility to work for Interac Corp. in Canada in a full-time capacity. • Currently completing an undergraduate degree/certificate from a creditable Canadian institution with a focus on Interaction Design, Design, UX/UI, or similar field • A strong portfolio that you can confidently demonstrate what you've directly contributed to while also highlighting the wide-range of your talents and capabilities.
